Package com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.representative.service

Class RepresentativeService

java.lang.Object
com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.representative.service.RepresentativeService
@Service public class RepresentativeService extends Object
Service class that handles operations related to government representatives.

  • Method Details

    • renderAllRepresentatives

      public List<com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.RepresentativeAdminModel> renderAllRepresentatives(String languageShortName, String search)
      Returns a list of all representatives, with their translations, optionally filtered by search criteria.
      Parameters:
      languageShortName - The language short name to use for translations.
      search - The search criteria to filter the results by. Can be null or empty.
      Returns:
      A list of RepresentativeAdminModel objects representing all the representatives that match the search criteria (if any).

    • renderAllRepresentativesByGovernmentId

      public List<com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.RepresentativeAdminModel> renderAllRepresentativesByGovernmentId(String languageShortName, Long governmentId, String search)
      Retrieves all representatives by government ID and returns a list of RepresentativeAdminModels, which include translations in the given language and are filtered by the search string.
      Parameters:
      languageShortName - The language short name to be used for translations.
      governmentId - The ID of the government to retrieve representatives for.
      search - The search string to be used for filtering the results.
      Returns:
      A list of RepresentativeAdminModels that match the search criteria.

    • getRepresentativeWithTranslation

      private com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.RepresentativeAdminModel getRepresentativeWithTranslation(UUID representativeId, String languageShortName)
      Returns a RepresentativeAdminModel object with the specified UUID and language short name.
      Parameters:
      representativeId - The UUID of the representative to retrieve.
      languageShortName - The language short name for the translation to include in the model.
      Returns:
      A RepresentativeAdminModel object with the specified UUID and language short name.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the representative with the given UUID does not exist in the database.

    • entityMatchesSearchCriteria

      private boolean entityMatchesSearchCriteria(com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.RepresentativeAdminModel model, String search)
      Checks if the given RepresentativeAdminModel object matches the specified search criteria. If any of the model's fields contains the given search string in a case-insensitive manner, returns true. In the if it was required to check null value as well, as translation is not a must! Search in case of a mobile number can be only a part of it, as it removes all hyphens from the phone number
      Parameters:
      model - The RepresentativeAdminModel object to check.
      search - The search string to check against the fields of the model.
      Returns:
      true if the model matches the search criteria, false otherwise.
